delete.not_enough_items: There aren't enough items to be deleted.
main.help:
======================== Command manual ========================
                      add, a - Add some items to an index.
             delete, dl, dlt - Delete some items from an index.
  search, s, sc, find, fd, f - Search where something is.
                    query, q - Show things in an index.
                  clear, cls - Clear the screen.
             display, d, dis - Display all items in all indexes.
                     l, lang - Toggle language.
                     help, h - Show this help message.
                  exit, quit - Quit the program.
================================================================
